de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.biclustering
Class FLOC<V extends RealVector<V,Double>>

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.logging.AbstractLoggable
      de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.optionhandling.AbstractParameterizable
          de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<V>
              de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.biclustering.AbstractBiclustering<V>
                  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.biclustering.FLOC<V>
Type Parameters:
V - a certain subtype of RealVector - the data matrix is supposed to consist of rows where each row relates to an object of type V and the columns relate to the attribute values of these objects
All Implemented Interfaces:
Algorithm<V>, Loggable, Parameterizable
public class FLOC<V extends RealVector<V,Double>>
extends AbstractBiclustering<V>

Provides a BiclusteringAlgorithm which deletes or inserts rows/columns in an available bicluster dependent on the gain of this action, finding biclusters with correlated values

Author:
Noemi Andor

Field Detail

ACTION_ORDER_ID

public static final OptionID ACTION_ORDER_ID
OptionID for the parameter ACTION_ORDER_PARAM.

ACTION_ORDER_PARAM

public final IntParameter ACTION_ORDER_PARAM
Parameter which indicates in which order actions should be performed. If its value is 0 (default) a weighted random order is performed, abetting actions with greater gain, if its value is 1 a random order is performed else, for values greater then 1 the normal order of actions (1..rowDim +colDim) is performed.

Default value: 0

Key: -FLOC.actionOrder

SEED_ID

public static final OptionID SEED_ID
OptionID for the parameter SEED_PARAM.

SEED_PARAM

public final IntParameter SEED_PARAM
Seed for creating initial clusters.

Default value: 1

Key: -FLOC.seed

K_ID

public static final OptionID K_ID
OptionID for the parameter K_PARAM.

K_PARAM

public final IntParameter K_PARAM
Parameter which indicates how many biclusters should be found.

Default value: 1

Key: -FLOC.k

INITIAL_ROW_DIM_ID

public static final OptionID INITIAL_ROW_DIM_ID
OptionID for the parameter INITIAL_ROW_DIM_PARAM.

INITIAL_ROW_DIM_PARAM

public final DoubleParameter INITIAL_ROW_DIM_PARAM
Parameter to approximate the rowDimension of an initial bicluster.

Key: -FLOC.initialRowDim

protected double meanOfRow(int row,
                           BitSet cols)
Adjusts the rowMean to the different requests of the FLOC_Algorithm; excluding missing entries from the computation.

Overrides:

Parameters:
